property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ This creature is put into the battle zone tapped. ■ If you have 6 shields or less, this creature doesn't untap. ■ Labyrinth: At the start of your turn, if you have more shields than your opponent, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {NEO EVOLUTION}: You may put it on one of your Water creatures. (If a creature is under it, treat it as a Neo Evolution Creature.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, draw 3 cards. Then discard 2 cards. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may choose a creature and return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: {BAD ACTION DYNAMITE} 2 (You may reduce this creature's summon cost by 2. If you do, destroy this creature at the end of the turn.) {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) ■ Whenever this creature attacks, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your graveyard. For each Beat Jockey you put into your graveyard, this creature breaks an additional shield until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, your opponent chooses one of their creatures that has the lowest power in the battle zone and destroys it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may draw a card for each of your Jokers in the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Choose one of your opponent's cards in the battle zone and put it on the bottom of its owner's deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {NEO EVOLUTION}: You may put it on one of your Light creatures. (If a creature is under it, treat it as a Neo Evolution Creature.) ■ Whenever your opponent would choose a creature, they can't choose this one. (It can still be attacked or blocked.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, add the top card of your deck to your shields face down.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever you discard a card from your hand, this creature gets +3000 power and gets "double breaker" until the end of the turn. (A creature that has "double breaker" breaks 2 shields.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a Mutopia, put it into your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, each of your opponent's creatures gets -2000 power until the end of the turn. (A creature that has power 0 or less is destroyed.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Put the top 2 cards of your deck into your graveyard. {CHARGER} (After you cast this spell, put it into your mana zone instead of your graveyard.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures. This creature and that creature battle. ■ If you put this creature into the battle zone during your opponent's turn, put this creature on the bottom of your deck at the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {NEO EVOLUTION}: You may put it on one of your Fire creatures. (If a creature is under it, treat it as a Neo Evolution Creature.) ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may put any number of Beat Jockeys from your graveyard on the top of your deck in any order. If you put 3 or more Beat Jockeys on the top of your deck this way, draw a card.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put all your opponent's creatures that have power 2000 or less into their owners' mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature, skip the rest of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature, choose one of your opponent's creatures and destroys it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy any number of your opponent's creatures that have total power 6000 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and put it into their mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Attack Chance: Colorless creature (When one of your colorless creatures attacks, you may cast this spell for no cost.) ■ Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. For each colorless card revealed, one of your creatures in the battle zone breaks an additional shield until the end of the turn. Put all revealed cards on the top or bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SUPER SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost. Then if you have no shields, you may use this card's Super Shield Trigger ability.) ■ Draw a card. {SUPER}: Destroy all creatures that cost the same as or less than the total number of your Jokers in the battle zone and/or your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever another creature is put into the battle zone, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Tap all your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. ■ Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Choose a non-evolution card that costs 6 or less in the battle zone and add it to its owner's shields face down.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) ■ Whenever a player puts a creature into the battle zone without tapping cards in their mana zone, destroy that creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Choose one of the following. ► Discard a card from your hand, then draw 2 cards: ► Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 2000 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Look at the top 6 cards of your deck. You may choose a creature from them, show that creature to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever a creature attacks for the first time each turn, that creature breaks an additional shield.

property.value: ■ Your Jokers creatures cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost 0 or less.

property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature, if you have 2 shields or less, you may shieldify the top card of your deck.

property.value: ■ Your Metallica cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost 0 or less.

property.value: ■ When you put this creature, look at your opponent's hand and discard a card from it.

property.value: ■ Your Mafi Gang cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost 0 or less.
